SA05n814:2: stutvā guṇairanupamairanubindupātraṃ stotraṃ mayā kṛtamidaṃ jaḍavāliśena |
SA05n814:3: lokeśvaraṃ guṇanidhiṃ guṇasāgaraṃ ca nityaṃ namāmi śirasāñjalisaṃpuṭena || 1 ||
SA05n814:4: prāṇeṣu yan sravati yena rasāmbupārān kṣuttṛṣṇaduḥkhaparipīḍitasarvasattvān |
SA05n814:5: evaṃvidhaṃ jagadidaṃ paripālanāya tasmai namo'stu satataṃ hi yathārthanāmne || 2 ||
SA05n814:7: sarveṣu yasya karuṇāmayavatsalatvaṃ tasmai namāmi bhavate karuṇāmayāya || 3 ||
SA05n814:9: kenāpi tvadguṇagaṇā gaṇane na śakyāstaṃ lokanāthamavalokitanāmasaṃjñam || 4 ||
SA05n814:11: vāme ca maṇḍaladharaṃ varadaṃ ca savye tvāṃ lokanātha śaraṇaṃ pravrajāmi nityam || 5 ||
SA05n814:13: nāthasya yasya bhavataścaraṇāmbujaṃ ca taṃ lokanāthacaraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi || 6 ||
SA05n814:15: vaiśvānarāsuraśataiḥ parivārabhūtaṃ taṃ lokanāthacaraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato'smi || 7 ||
SA05n814:18: ślokāṣṭakaṃ pratidinaṃ khalu ye paṭhanti te prāpnuvanti sahasā dhanaputramokṣān |
SA05n814:19: kuṣṭhādiroganikaraṃ kṣamatāṃ prayāti vandāmahe ca nitarāṃ tava pādayugme || 9 ||
